level.heading: Cancellation of solicitations.
level.text: An Invitation for Bid, a Request for Proposals, or other solicitation may be cancelled if it is determined in writing by the CPO that the action is taken in the best interests of the District government.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-371
level.text: For history of Law 18-371, see notes under ยง 2-351.01.
